alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 8:24AM EDT until August 30 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and west central Florida, including the following counties, in central Florida, Hardee. In south central Florida, DeSoto. In west central Florida, Manatee. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 824 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... North Port, Arcadia, Southeast Arcadia, Sweetwater, Brownville, Gardner, Nocatee, Fort Ogden and Lake Suzy. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
